markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Environmental](/Traits.aspx?ID=62)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A hazard with this trait is something dangerous that’s part of the natural world, such as quicksand or harmful mold.
name: Environmental
